title: Restore missing main navigation menu after Version 15 deployment

requirements.text: Restore the main navigation menu in frontend/src/App.tsx that displays menu items (Dashboard, Add Voter, Voter List, Label Printing, Task Management, Analytics) for both mobile and desktop views. The navigation menu disappeared after Version 15 deployment while the header with 'Voter Management System' title and logout button remain visible.

quotes: menu bar is missing from both mobile and desktop view
1 yes main menu 2 yes it worked before last deployment 3 yes header and logout is visible

acceptanceCriteria: Main navigation menu is visible on both mobile and desktop views
Menu displays all items: Dashboard, Add Voter, Voter List, Label Printing, Task Management, and Analytics
Navigation menu appears below or alongside the header with 'Voter Management System' title
Logout button remains visible and functional
Navigation links route correctly to their respective pages

requirements.text: Verify that the navigation menu rendering logic in frontend/src/App.tsx was not accidentally removed or conditionally hidden during the Version 15 deployment. Check for any CSS classes, conditional rendering, or display properties that may be causing the menu to be hidden.
acceptanceCriteria: Navigation menu JSX elements are present in the App.tsx component
No CSS classes with display:none or visibility:hidden are applied to navigation elements
Conditional rendering logic does not prevent menu from displaying when user is authenticated
Navigation menu is not positioned off-screen or with zero height/width

constraints: Do not modify the Internet Identity authentication logic in frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts
Keep the header with 'Voter Management System' title and logout button visible and functional
Maintain the existing dark blue (#002080) color scheme for header and buttons
Ensure navigation menu works with the existing TanStack Router setup
nonGoals: Adding new navigation menu items beyond the six existing ones
Redesigning the navigation menu layout or styling
Modifying the logout button behavior or appearance
Changing the header text or responsive sizing
